firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to manage user data, chats, and messages. It prioritizes security by segregating user-owned data. User profiles, sessions, and chats are all keyed by user ID or have ownership fields that can be easily validated by security rules. This path-based ownership and data segregation simplify rules and prevent users from accessing data that does not belong to them.
